Name: Lemon Drop Shot
Description: A zesty and refreshing shot with a citrus twist
Recipe: Shake vodka, triple sec, lemon juice, and simple syrup with ice. Strain into a shot glass. Optionally, rim the glass with sugar.

Name: Moscow Mule
Description: A classic and refreshing cocktail with a ginger kick
Recipe: Combine vodka, ginger beer, lime juice, and simple syrup in a copper mug filled with ice. Stir and garnish with a lime wedge.

Name: Cosmopolitan
Description: A sophisticated and tangy cocktail for cosmopolitan tastes
Recipe: Shake vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and lime juice with ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with an orange twist.

Name: Espresso Martini
Description: A delightful blend of coffee and spirits for coffee lovers
Recipe: Shake vodka, coffee liqueur, espresso, and simple syrup with ice. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with coffee beans.

Name: Pi√±a Colada
Description: A tropical and creamy cocktail that transports you to the beach
Recipe: Blend white rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice with ice until smooth. Pour into a chilled glass and garnish with a pineapple chunk.

Name: Whiskey Sour
Description: A classic sour cocktail with the rich flavor of whiskey
Recipe: Shake bourbon whiskey, lemon juice, simple syrup, and egg white without ice. Add ice and shake again. Strain into a rocks glass over ice.

Name: Mai Tai
Description: A tropical and fruity tiki cocktail with a punch
Recipe: Shake light rum, dark rum, orange liqueur, orgeat syrup, and lime juice with ice. Strain into a glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a pineapple leaf.

Name: Negroni
Description: A bitter and bold cocktail with the perfect balance of flavors
Recipe: Stir gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth with ice. Strain into a rocks glass over ice. Garnish with an orange twist.
